recipes.name: Chicken Tagine
recipes.description: A delicious Moroccan chicken tagine with spices and preserved lemons.

instructions.description: In a tagine, brown the chicken thighs in olive oil.
Add the preserved lemons, cumin, and other spices.
Simmer for 45 minutes until the chicken is tender.

recipes.name: Couscous with Vegetables
recipes.description: A vegetarian Moroccan couscous with a variety of colorful vegetables.

instructions.description: Cook the couscous according to the package instructions.
Steam the carrots and zucchini until tender.
Serve the couscous with steamed vegetables on top.
